description: API giving overring various low level functionalities

functions.name: deleteVisit
functions.description: Delete a history visit by given `visitId`

functions.name: fillFromVisit
functions.description: Mark visit of given `url` as being triggered by visit of specified `triggeringUrl`.

functions.name: showHistoryDeletionPopup
functions.description: Show the browser history deletion dialog

functions.name: markAsHidden
functions.description: Hide the last visit of specified `url` from history

functions.name: cleanupEmptySearches
functions.description: Deletes all search sessions consisting of a single cliqz search

functions.name: stats
functions.description: Returns stats for the history DB

functions.name: changeAddonState
functions.description: Changes the state of an addon enabled/disabled

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the add-on to enable/disable.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether to enable or disable the add-on.

functions.name: unifiedSearch
functions.description: Changes the state of an addon enabled/disabled

functions.name: getSearchEngines
functions.description: Returns all complementary search engines that come from the browser searchplugins/list.json

functions.name: setSelectedSearchEngine
functions.description: Sets a new selected complementary search engine as a default

functions.name: openImportDialog
functions.description: Open the Import Settings and Data dialog

functions.name: topDomains
functions.description: Returns the top domains from the user's history

functions.name: setPref
functions.description: set the value of browser pref
